Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: A 9-year old electronics fan
Reviews.Content: Good decision not to upgrade. Was like new. I've had this simple phone for several years. Very Happy with purchase

Reviews.Title: It doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Barber
Reviews.Content: I received the phone and got service for it at AT&T.;  It worked for 3 days and now will not connect/allow calls.  At&T; says the connections are shot and that this was NOT a new phone but a refurbished.  They are still trying to fix it; but they think I should get a different phone

Reviews.Title: Great phone and very good price!!
Reviews.Author: Kay "Dorothy Kay"
Reviews.Content: Made a good replacement for my older version. Thus far, pleased and ordered a 2nd one for my daughter. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Good old phone
Reviews.Author: mightyT
Reviews.Content: My grandmother had this model and it broke, so I needed to get the same one so she wouldn't have to learn anything new.  I also had to get a data cable to connect to PC so I could transfer the address book myself.  That was relatively easy to do.
